title: Mechanical aptitudes
brief_description: Illustrates ways to test the mechanical interests and abilities of a student. A high school counsellor explains that the vocational field selected is not always entirely suited to the talents of the student. A student undergoes a series of test to find a course of study best suited to his interests, abilities and future plans. Different departments of training for a student interested in a given field are illustrated.
